mapper.select: SELECT product.product_id, product.cover_img, product.category_id, brand.english_name, product.img_modified, tag_product_rel.sort_num, product.min_im_price AS im_price, product.preview_im_price AS preview_im_price, CONVERT(1 - product.min_im_price / product.min_retail_price, DECIMAL(10, 2)) AS im_discount, CONVERT(1 - product.preview_im_price / product.min_retail_price, DECIMAL(10, 2)) AS preview_discount, spu.`cover_img` AS spu_cover_img, vendor.vendor_name FROM tag_product_rel INNER JOIN product ON tag_product_rel.product_id = product.product_id AND product.enabled = TRUE INNER JOIN brand ON brand.brand_id = product.brand_id AND brand.enabled = TRUE LEFT JOIN spu ON product.`spu_id` = spu.`spu_id` AND spu.`enabled` = TRUE LEFT JOIN vendor ON product.`vendor_id` = vendor.`vendor_id` AND vendor.`enabled` = TRUE WHERE tag_product_rel.tag_id = #{tagId};
SELECT tag.tag_id, block_tag_rel.block_tag_id, block_tag_rel.block_id FROM tag LEFT JOIN block_tag_rel ON tag.tag_id = block_tag_rel.tag_id WHERE tag.tag_id = #{tagId} AND tag.enabled = TRUE;

SELECT `block`.block_id, `block`.block_name, `block`.status, `block`.title, `block`.create_at, `block`.modified_at, `block`.content, `block`.bg_color, `block`.text_color, `block`.sort_order, `block`.subtitle, `block`.title_english, `block`.cover_img, tag.tag_id, tag_name FROM `block` LEFT JOIN block_tag_rel ON block_tag_rel.block_id = block.block_id LEFT JOIN tag ON block_tag_rel.tag_id = tag.tag_id AND tag.enabled = TRUE WHERE `block`.block_id = #{block_id,jdbcType=BIGINT} AND `block`.enabled = TRUE
